version_description:
- New languages and availability in a list of new countries
- Various improvements

- New languages and availability in a list of new countries
- Various improvements

New update! Visual search is a new feature that allows you to point your camera at any piece of furniture and find the most similar IKEA product. It’s powered by our friends at Grokstyle and we’re looking forward to hear what you think if it. We've also improved product browsing and added a "My favorites" section to give you a better overview of products you like.

If you like using IKEA Place, we'd appreciate it if you could leave a review in the App Store.

We've improved a couple of things throughout the app. We now have faster scrolling, higher quality camera view, better browsing of products, revamped animations and overall improvement in performance. We’ve also added universal support for Magic Flatpacks.

If you enjoy using IKEA Place, we would greatly appreciate it if you leave a nice review.

- GDPR compliance
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- GDPR compliance
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- GDPR compliance
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

We've improved and added a few things throughout the app:

- Faster scanning: With ARKit2 scanning the room is now quicker and more accurate than ever!
- New colour picker: Easily switch colours and style of the furniture you've placed (available on certain products only).
- Product updates: Every item now has detailed product information.
- Performance has also been improved, along with an updated privacy policy.

If you like using IKEA Place, we'd appreciate it if you could leave a review in the App Store.

We've improved and added a few things throughout the app:
- Faster scanning: With ARKit2 scanning the room is now quicker and more accurate than ever!
- New colour picker: Easily switch colours and style of the furniture you've placed (available on certain products only).
- Product updates: Every item now has detailed product information.
- Performance has also been improved, along with an updated privacy policy.

If you like using IKEA Place, we'd appreciate it if you could leave a review in the App Store.
Minor bug fixes and visual improvements.
This update includes stability improvements and bug fixes.
